title: The Neddiad
subtitle: How Neddie Took the Train, Went to Hollywood, and Saved Civilization
description: When shoelace heir Neddie Wentworthstein and his family take the train from Chicago to Los Angeles in the 1940s, he winds up in possession of a valuable Indian turtle artifact whose owner is supposed to be able to prevent the impending destruction of the world, but he is not sure exactly how. 50,000 first printing.
